snippet.title: Tennis for Two - The Original Video Game
snippet.description:
Designed by William Higinbotham in 1958 at Brookhaven National Labs on Long Island, NY, Tennis for Two is commonly regarded as the original video game. This video features a reproduced version of the game built at Brookhaven using original components, for its 50th anniversary.

Bounce over to the history of Tennis for Two, at The Dot Eaters:
http://thedoteaters.com/?bitstory=tennis-for-two

http://www.thedoteaters.com Video Game History 101

-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
View the goofy glitch that makes playing Access Software's classic game Leader Board Golf so much fun: 
https://youtu.be/HnEN942x5rY
-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
